verses.text: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*:

\w Command|strong="H6680"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Offer|strong="H7126"\w* ye \w my|strong="H8104"\w* oblation \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* burnt sacrifice \w of|strong="H1121"\w* most sweet odour, \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H7126"\w* due \w seasons|strong="H4150"\w*.

\w These|strong="H2088"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* sacrifices \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w*: \w Two|strong="H8147"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H7126"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w without|strong="H8549"\w* \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w* \w every|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w perpetual|strong="H8548"\w* holocaust:

\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* shall \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H0996"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \w and|strong="H1242"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w other|strong="H0259"\w* \w in|strong="H0996"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*:

\w And|strong="H8081"\w* \w the|strong="H7243"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* part \w of|strong="H1969"\w* \w an|strong="H4503"\w* ephi \w of|strong="H1969"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w*, which shall \w be|strong="H8081"\w* tempered \w with|strong="H8081"\w* \w the|strong="H7243"\w* purest \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, \w of|strong="H1969"\w* \w the|strong="H7243"\w* \w measure|strong="H0374"\w* \w of|strong="H1969"\w* \w the|strong="H7243"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* part \w of|strong="H1969"\w* \w a|strong="H8081"\w* \w hin|strong="H1969"\w*.

\w It|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w continual|strong="H8548"\w* holocaust \w which|strong="H2022"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* offered \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* most sweet. odour \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H8548"\w* \w by|strong="H0801"\w* \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H0259"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* libation you \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* offer \w of|strong="H3068"\w* wine \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* part \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w hin|strong="H1969"\w* \w for|strong="H0259"\w* \w every|strong="H0259"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w like|strong="H3068"\w* manner ill \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* according \w to|strong="H3068"\w* all \w the|strong="H0853"\w* rites \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* libations thereof, \w an|strong="H3068"\w* oblation \w of|strong="H3068"\w* most sweet odour \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* offer \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3117"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w without|strong="H8549"\w* \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* tenths \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* tempered \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* libations,

Which \w regularly|strong="H8548"\w* are poured \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H7676"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w perpetual|strong="H8548"\w* holocaust.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \w day|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w you|strong="H7126"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w a|strong="H7126"\w* holocaust \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w calves|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w herd|strong="H1241"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H7126"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, \w without|strong="H8549"\w* \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*,

\w And|strong="H8081"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* tenths \w of|strong="H0259"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* tempered \w with|strong="H8147"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w in|strong="H4503"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w* \w for|strong="H0259"\w* \w every|strong="H0259"\w* calf: \w and|strong="H8081"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* tenths \w of|strong="H0259"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* tempered \w with|strong="H8147"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w for|strong="H0259"\w* \w every|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6241"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6241"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* tempered \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w* \w for|strong="H0259"\w* \w every|strong="H0259"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w*. \w It|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* holocaust \w of|strong="H3068"\w* most sweet odour \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H3068"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w by|strong="H0801"\w* \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6499"\w* \w these|strong="H2063"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* libations \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w that|strong="H8141"\w* \w are|strong="H8141"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* poured out \w for|strong="H1961"\w* \w every|strong="H8141"\w* victim: \w Half|strong="H2677"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w hin|strong="H1969"\w* \w for|strong="H1961"\w* \w every|strong="H8141"\w* calf, \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w for|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, \w and|strong="H6499"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w for|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w*. \w This|strong="H2063"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* holocaust \w for|strong="H1961"\w* \w every|strong="H8141"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H8141"\w* succeed \w one|strong="H3532"\w* another \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* course \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*.

\w A|strong="H5921"\w* buck \w goat|strong="H5795"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* offered \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w offering|strong="H3068"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w perpetual|strong="H8548"\w* holocaust \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* libations.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* fourteenth \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* phase \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* fifteenth \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* solemn \w feast|strong="H2282"\w*: \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w them|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* venerable \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*: \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* servile \w work|strong="H4399"\w* therein.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H7126"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* sacrifice \w a|strong="H1961"\w* holocaust \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w calves|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w herd|strong="H1241"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, \w without|strong="H8549"\w* \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*:

\w And|strong="H8081"\w* \w for|strong="H6241"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H4503"\w* \w of|strong="H8147"\w* every \w one|strong="H8147"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* tenths \w of|strong="H8147"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* which shall \w be|strong="H8081"\w* tempered \w with|strong="H8147"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w to|strong="H4503"\w* every calf, \w and|strong="H8081"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* tenths \w to|strong="H4503"\w* every \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0259"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6241"\w* \w of|strong="H0259"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6241"\w*, \w to|strong="H0259"\w* \w every|strong="H0259"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w*, that \w is|strong="H0259"\w* \w to|strong="H0259"\w* say, \w to|strong="H0259"\w* \w all|strong="H0259"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0259"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* buck \w goat|strong="H8163"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* make \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*,

\w Besides|strong="H0905"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* holocaust \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w always|strong="H8548"\w* \w offer|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w every|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fire|strong="H0801"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* most sweet odour \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w which|strong="H0428"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* rise \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* holocaust, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* libations \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w each|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w also|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* solemn \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* unto \w you|strong="H3605"\w*: \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* servile \w work|strong="H4399"\w* therein.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* firstfruits, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w after|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w weeks|strong="H7620"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w accomplished|strong="H6213"\w*, \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w fruits|strong="H1061"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* venerable \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*: \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* servile \w work|strong="H4399"\w* therein.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H7126"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w a|strong="H7126"\w* holocaust \w for|strong="H0259"\w* \w a|strong="H7126"\w* most sweet odour \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w calves|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w herd|strong="H1241"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H7126"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, without blemish:

\w And|strong="H8081"\w* \w in|strong="H4503"\w* \w the|strong="H8147"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H4503"\w* \w of|strong="H0259"\w* them \w three|strong="H7969"\w* tenths \w of|strong="H0259"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* tempered \w with|strong="H8147"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w to|strong="H4503"\w* \w every|strong="H0259"\w* calf, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w to|strong="H4503"\w* \w every|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*,

The \w tenth|strong="H6241"\w* \w of|strong="H0259"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6241"\w* \w to|strong="H0259"\w* \w every|strong="H0259"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w*, which \w in|strong="H3532"\w* \w all|strong="H0259"\w* are \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*: \w a|strong="H0259"\w* buck goat also,

Which \w is|strong="H0259"\w* slain \w for|strong="H5921"\w* expiation: \w besides|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* perpetual holocaust \w and|strong="H5795"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* libations thereof.

\w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H0905"\w* \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H8548"\w* \w without|strong="H8549"\w* \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w* \w with|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* libations.
